citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50 to 1:25
pm on 04-OCT-17.
Honk horn, ring the bell, call phone, leave business card.
